title: Visual Learner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Investigate a player. This will return a stock photo that represents their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host puts the role name into https://www.shutterstock.com/ and selects one of the images, which is then shown to you.
- If there is no result for the search, you are informed of such.

desc:
Post 251
*Business Fraud Investigation Using Magnifying Glass. Finance And Tax*
